oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Postcard image of Cpl. Gabe H. Atkins, Btry. A, 318th FA, 81st Div.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: A photographic postcard of Cpl. Gabe H. Atkins, Btry. A, 318th FA, 81st Div., in uniform with corporal stripes on the upper right sleeve. Atkins was born 9 May 1893, in Grainger County, Tennessee. He married Laura Bell Hipsher in May 1914 and registered for the draft June 5, 1917. He was discharged from military service on June 20, 1919. Cpl. Atkins died June 5, 1971 and is buried in Kitts Cemetery, Grainger Co., Tenn. The 81st Division saw action in the Muese-Argonne Offensive of 1918.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Atkins, Gabe H.
World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
